alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:19PM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Camas Prairie zone. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is a long duration snow event with multiple periods of heavy snow. The heaviest snow will fall tonight into Sunday morning, but additional periods of heavy snow will occur through Tuesday. There could be lulls Sunday afternoon and during the day on Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
